price: 97. Voelden de mensen van de steden zich dan veilig voor de komst van Onze bestraffing in de nacht terwijl zij sliepen?
arabic: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُم بَأۡسُنَا بَيَٰتٗا وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: afa-amina ahlu al-qurā an yatiyahum basunā bayātan wahum nāimūna
